word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><font style="" face="Fira Code">Mutex_t <font style="" color="#517db8"><b><u>mtx</u></b></font>;</font></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><font style="" face="Fira Code">CondVar_t <font style="" color="#d15454"><b><u>cv</u></b></font>;</font></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-decoration-color: initial;"><br></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><font style="" face="Fira Code"><font style="" color="#667aff"><u style=""><b>mtx</b></u></font>.lock();</font></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-size: 12px;"><font style="" face="Fira Code"><font style="" color="#d65656"><u style=""><b>cv</b></u></font>.wait(<u style=""><b style=""><font color="#4b7e9c">mtx</font></b></u>, [&amp;] {</font></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; condition</font></font></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-color: var(--border-color);">void wait(</font><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;;">Mutex_t&amp; <u style=""><font style="" style=""><b>pred</b></u></span><span style="font-weight: 400; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-color: var(--border-color); font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;;">) {</span></div><div style="border-color: style="border-color: var(--border-color);">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span>while (!<b><u>pred</u></b>()) {</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); var(--border-color);">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="border-color: var(--border-color);">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span>block_this();</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color);"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color);">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span>}</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
